name: Inner Humans
description:
Note: Game only has proper proportions in full screen for some reason so yeah.

Story:

A young demon named note to self insert cool demon name here realizes he's just misunderstood and decides to start helping people instead of killing them. His only problem: he still looks like a demon.

Controls: 

WASD or ZQSD to move
LMB to attack
Space to switch between demon form and human form
